channel.title: Is there any point?
channel.description:
Well, I've been away from here for quite some time now. I'm really wondering if there's actually anyone that still gets into RS cheating.
What I'm really asking, I guess, is: Is it worth it to still try to make a bot? I mean, do you think people would use it? Do you think people would be motivated to script for it?
Thanks guys, I'm just trying to find something to do, and I don't want it to be something that has absolutely no meaning (Little meaning would be way better :))

item.title: Is there any point?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:10, topic:327818”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=424206.msg3116570#msg3116570 date=1265048896]
Problem is all bots out there r shittttttt
[/quote]
Well then make another one and this time don’t let fags overpower you? :P[/quote]

He sure should. How about calling it zetabot? :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any point?
item.dc:creator: @Tenac Tenac
item.description:
@Tenac wrote:

Freddy is making one over at rs-hacking, Quirlion and KBot or still pretty strong, RSBot and iBot are never going to die, I suppose people are still supporting RS cheating, I don’t see why though.

I see no reason to however, it’s the most unproductive thing I can think of right now, unless a good profit is guaranteed. I’ve moved onto programming non-runescape related things which is more fun I think, since it takes away the stress of having a to fight against the constantly changing things in runescape. Making a bot is a complete waste now a days I’d say, but making a good pay script is okay to do, or program other games/applications for fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any point?

item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“BAsh, post:5, topic:327818”][quote author=chri5 link=topic=424206.msg3115642#msg3115642 date=1264944948]
I think Rsbot makes more money than iBot, have you seen that shitpile of ads they have? They probably have more users than iBot because of the Open Source-ness. I also think that they’d get a lot of donations…

Plus FOSS is amazing.
[/quote]
pseudo-opensource[/quote]

Code license: GNU General Public License v3
or are you talking about the monetization? Or neither?

item.title: Is there any point?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Original Daniel:

Idk how much qauters and ruler makes but it must be worth it. In the least you could make a script which is slightly less shit than the rest, put an auth on it and make decent money for your time.

I think Rsbot makes more money than iBot, have you seen that shitpile of ads they have? They probably have more users than iBot because of the Open Source-ness. I also think that they’d get a lot of donations…

Plus FOSS is amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any point?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Have a look at rsbot and rscheata. Most of the scripters are as retarded as the rest of the community but there’s still plenty of them.

Idk how much qauters and ruler makes but it must be worth it. In the least you could make a script which is slightly less shit than the rest, put an auth on it and make decent money for your time.
